answers.answer: Hi!If you were my the snt, I would advise you that what you are describing is fairly common during pregnancy if it is mild. The symptoms are probably due to the highly elevated hormone levels that are normal during pregnancy.If the dizziness is severe, it could be a sign of vestibulitis or vertigo.  If the room is spinning, you call your doctor, if it is more like being light headed, it is probably the norm.Hope this helps!Dr B

Yes. Your Hormones ARe Going Crazy N It Will Make U Feel Like Your In Someone Elses Body. Stay Hydrated N Calm And You Will Be Fine. Also Might Need To Make Sure Your Having Enough Sugar Cuz Your Sugar May Be Trying To drop. (IM 32 Weeks With My Second Baby Girl. It Happened With Both Of My Girls)

title: dizzyness
